      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:

    • isNextNounWin

      public boolean isNextNounWin​(Noun nextNoun)
      Check if nextNoun does have the Win property. If he does, set the win field to true, and return true.
      Parameters:
      nextNoun - The Noun we are going on with a You Noun
      Returns:
      true if nextNoun has the Win property, otherwise false

    • isWin

      public boolean isWin()
      Check if we won by returning Win field, and checking all You Noun property (in case they have Win property)
      Returns:
      True if we won, otherwise false

    • isDefeat

      public boolean isDefeat()
      Check if we have at least a noun that is You, and if all You Noun aren't empty (in case all You have been destroyed even though we still have "NOUN IS YOU")
      Returns:
      True if we lost, otherwise false

    • nounMap

      propertyMap's getter

    • poisonEffect

      public void poisonEffect()
      If "You" has been poisoned, decrease poison field by 1

    • hasBeenPoisoned

      public void hasBeenPoisoned()
      If "You" has been poisoned, set the field poison to 10 : player has 10 movements left before dying

    • isOutOfBoard

      public boolean isOutOfBoard​(int line, int column)
      Check if the coordinates (line, column) in parameters are out of the board
      Parameters:
      line - The line coordinate
      column - The column coordinate
      Returns:
      True if the coordinates (line, column) is out of the board, otherwise false

    • drawAllWords

      public void drawAllWords​(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, float width, float height, float size, float horizontalPadding, float verticalPadding)
      Draw all the noun in the nounMap, and the words in wordList
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      width - The width of the window of the game
      height - The height of the window of the game
      size - Size of a word in the game
      horizontalPadding - Space we add horizontally to center the screen
      verticalPadding - Space we add vertically to center the screen

    • youIsMoving

      height - The height of the window of the game
      size - Size of a word in the game
      horizontalPadding - Space we add horizontally to center the screen
      verticalPadding - Space we add vertically to center the screen

    • isThereANoun

      public boolean isThereANoun​(Word word, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove, int nextLine, int nextColumn) throws java.io.IOException
      Check if there's a noun on coordinates (nextLine, nextColumn). If there is, check all its properties, and if we can go on its cell
      Parameters:
      word - The word going on coordinates (nextLine, nextColumn).
      direction - The direction word takes
      nounsToRemove - All nouns that needs to be remove in case we need to (sink, defeat, etc.)
      nextLine - word's next line if he moves
      nextColumn - word's next column if he moves
      Returns:
      true if we can go on the cell, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • isThereAWord

      public boolean isThereAWord​(int nextLine, int nextColumn, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove) throws java.io.IOException
      Check if there's a noun on coordinates (nextLine, nextColumn). If there is, check if it can move
      Parameters:
      nextLine - word's next line if he moves
      nextColumn - word's next column if he moves
      direction - The direction word takes
      nounsToRemove - All nouns that needs to be remove in case we need to (sink, defeat, etc.)
      Returns:
      true if we can go on the cell, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • gameResults

      public void gameResults​(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, float height, float width)
      Display the level's results, whether the player won or lost, and close the window after X seconds
      Parameters:
      context - Application context
      height - The height of the window of the game
      width - The width of the window of the game
